mapper.select: SELECT * from MDST.STOCK S, MDST.CMPROD C WHERE S.STK_PRODUCT = C.CMP_PRODUCT AND trim(S.STK_PRODUCT) = #{item} AND trim(S.STK_LOC) = #{database}
mapper.sql: STK_PRODUCT, STK_LOC, STK_STKQTY, STK_VALUE, STK_AVCOST, STK_MINQTY, STK_REORDER, STK_MAXQTY, STK_ORIGCOST, STK_LATECOST, STK_OSPURCH, STK_CHDATE, STK_CHCAT, STK_WHATIF, STK_ALLSTK, STK_BACKORD, STK_FWDORD, STK_CALQTY, STK_LASTSALE, STK_QUOTORD, STK_BUYER, STK_NEXTSEQ, STK_FIFOSEQ, STK_BINREF, STK_AVVAL, STK_FIVAL, STK_LASTPURCH, STK_LASTMOV, STK_ORDSTAT, STK_OSWOP, STK_UNAVQTY, STK_OSITR, STK_PICKBIN, STK_ZONE, STK_RESVPO, STK_CAT, STK_CREDATE, STK_MANCAT, STK_INSPBIN, STK_HOLDBIN, STK_RESQTY, STK_BASFIVAL, STK_BASAVVAL, STK_BASEVAL, STK_ISLQTY, STK_ISLDATE, STK_LINKQTY, STK_FPADJ, STK_CCAT, STK_MANCCAT, STK_PBSTAT, STK_ORDCAT, STK_ORDMANCAT, STK_CYCLECNT, STK_PROJCODE, STK_SUPPLIER, STK_PRCLAS, STK_WHCAT, STK_SDENSITY, STK_UNVALLQTY, STK_ASSOCQTY, STK_SUPPCOMP
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from MDST.STOCK
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into MDST.STOCK (STK_PRODUCT, STK_LOC, STK_STKQTY, STK_VALUE, STK_AVCOST, STK_MINQTY, STK_REORDER, STK_MAXQTY, STK_ORIGCOST, STK_LATECOST, STK_OSPURCH, STK_CHDATE, STK_CHCAT, update MDST.STOCK
STK_PRODUCT = #{record.stkProduct,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_LOC = #{record.stkLoc,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_STKQTY = #{record.stkStkqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_VALUE = #{record.stkValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_AVCOST = #{record.stkAvcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_MINQTY = #{record.stkMinqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

STK_MAXQTY = #{record.stkMaxqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_ORIGCOST = #{record.stkOrigcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

STK_OSPURCH = #{record.stkOspurch,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

STK_WHATIF = #{record.stkWhatif,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_ALLSTK = #{record.stkAllstk,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_BACKORD = #{record.stkBackord,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

STK_QUOTORD = #{record.stkQuotord,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_BUYER = #{record.stkBuyer,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_NEXTSEQ = #{record.stkNextseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_FIFOSEQ = #{record.stkFifoseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_BINREF = #{record.stkBinref,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_AVVAL = #{record.stkAvval,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_FIVAL = #{record.stkFival,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_LASTPURCH = #{record.stkLastpurch,jdbcType=DATE},
STK_LASTMOV = #{record.stkLastmov,jdbcType=DATE},
STK_ORDSTAT = #{record.stkOrdstat,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_OSWOP = #{record.stkOswop,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_UNAVQTY = #{record.stkUnavqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_OSITR = #{record.stkOsitr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_PICKBIN = #{record.stkPickbin,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_ZONE = #{record.stkZone,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_RESVPO = #{record.stkResvpo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_CAT = #{record.stkCat,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_CREDATE = #{record.stkCredate,jdbcType=DATE},
STK_MANCAT = #{record.stkMancat,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_INSPBIN = #{record.stkInspbin,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_HOLDBIN = #{record.stkHoldbin,jdbcType=CHAR},
STK_RESQTY = #{record.stkResqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_BASFIVAL = #{record.stkBasfival,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_BASAVVAL = #{record.stkBasavval,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_BASEVAL = #{record.stkBaseval,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_ISLQTY = #{record.stkIslqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_ISLDATE = #{record.stkIsldate,jdbcType=DATE},
STK_LINKQTY = #{record.stkLinkqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_FPADJ = #{record.stkFpadj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

STK_PBSTAT = #{record.stkPbstat,jdbcType=CHAR},

STK_CYCLECNT = #{record.stkCyclecnt,jdbcType=CHAR},

STK_ASSOCQTY = #{record.stkAssocqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STK_SUPPCOMP = #{record.stkSuppcomp,jdbcType=CHAR},
